Address.value: 2929 EAST COMMERCIAL BOULEVARD,SUITE 303, FORT LAUDERDALE, Florida, 33308, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: OptimumBank Holdings Inc serves as a bank holding company for OptimumBank. The Bank provides a range of community banking services to individuals and corporate customers. Its services include demand interest-bearing and non-interest-bearing accounts, negotiable order of withdrawal account, money market deposit accounts, debit cards, and automated teller machines.
